translations.text: By the Fig and the Olive,
and by this secure land,<sup foot_note=212992>1</sup>
We have indeed created man in the best of mould,
then We cast him down as the lowest of the low,
except for those who believe and do good deedsâ€”theirs shall be an unending reward!<sup foot_note=212993>1</sup>
What then after this, can make you deny the Last Judgement?
Is not God the greatest of the judges?
